articles.content: Nigerian Tobi Amusan broke the womens 100m hurdles world record in the semifinals at the world track and field championships in Eugene, Oregon. She went even faster to win the final nearly two hours … [+1193 chars]

articles.title: XFL 3.0 announces locations, head coaches - Footballscoop
articles.description: The league will look similar and different when it launches for a third time next spring.
articles.content:
Well, here we go again. 
The third iteration of the XFL announced its eight franchise locations and head coaches on Sunday night.

articles.title: Tony Finau shoots 4-under 67 | Round 4 | 3M Open - PGA TOUR
articles.description: In the final round of the 2022 3M Open, Tony Finau shot a 4-under 67 to roar back and win at TPC Twin Cities.SUBSCRIBE to PGA TOUR now: http://pgat.us/vBxcZS...
